sentences.english: Her illness was due to bad food.
sentences.chinese: 她的病逝吃了變質的食物造成的。

sentences.english: Chen Sixiang injury has a relapse, New Years eve died of the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 陳四祥因傷復發，除夕夜病逝醫院。

sentences.english: Mulan went to the hospital to visit professor shen, professor shen died.
sentences.chinese: 木蘭去醫院看望沈教授，沒想到沈教授病逝。

sentences.english: After three months' medical treatment, he was called to God in his bed last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 治療三個月後，他於上週日病逝了。

sentences.english: Mr. Behrman died of pneumonia today in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾蒙先生今天在醫院因肺炎病逝了。

sentences.english: Big wife clay-coldly the second year, king too the madam died of illness.
sentences.chinese: 大太太死後的第二年，王太夫人就病逝了。

sentences.english: In the next September, Zuo Zongtang died in Fuzhou.
sentences.chinese: 第二年9月，左宗棠病逝於福州。

sentences.english: Lin Boqu, Chinese soldier and revolutionary, died of illness in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 中國軍事家和革命家林柏渠在北京病逝。

definition: to live to the (ripe) age of
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to die/to depart from the world forever
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
to die/to depart this mortal coil
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
